code.name: Url to thumbnail
code.desc: Given a url of a video hosted on ted, youtube or vimeo, finds where the video is hosted and outputs the thumbnail for that video.

code.name: Questions Reader
code.desc: Example of how you can read and parse JSON file in Java. Requires JSON library.

code.name: Salesforce/Airtable subscription form.
code.desc: Example of salesforce newsletter subscription form. Also shows how a single form can be submitted to multiple destinations.

code.name: StayinAlive
code.desc: Ping a computer and upload the response (up or down) to firebase. Also send an email if the computer is down.

code.name: StayinAliveClient
code.desc: Downloads computer status from firebase and displays them on a local website while constantly updating status using websockets

code.name: Google Analytics to CSV
code.desc: Pulls information from google analytics and exports it CSV. Good for exporting a huge amount of data at once.

code.name: Frequency in array
code.desc: Count frequency of a string in a given array without using any functions or classes in Java.

code.name: Youtube to airtable
code.desc: Scrape videos data like duration, thumbnail, closed captions, views and description etc from youtube and pushes to airtable.

code.name: BAM index checker
code.desc: Given a folder, checks if the bam index files in a directory are newer than their corresponding bam files.

code.name: Airtable fill book information
code.desc: Get ISBN numbers from an airtable sheet, query google books for book information like cover, title, description and add them back to airtable.
